name: Titanium.UI.iOS.LivePhotoView
summary: A view to display a Titanium.UI.iOS.LivePhoto object introduced in iOS 9.1.

events.name: start
events.summary: Fired when the Live Photo playback starts.

properties.name: playbackStyle
properties.summary: Returns the playbackStyle that was provided to start the playback.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: stop
events.summary: Fired when the Live Photo playback stops.

properties.name: playbackStyle
properties.summary: Returns the playbackStyle that was provided to start the playback.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

methods.name: startPlaybackWithStyle
methods.summary: Begins playback of Live Photo content in the view.
methods.description:
Use the playbackStyle parameter to choose whether to play the full motion and sound content of the Live Photo or only a brief section.

Typically, an app does not need to directly control playback, because a Live Photo view provides interactive playback control. Use this method only when non-interactive playback is appropriate-for example, to briefly animate the content to indicate that a view contains a Live Photo rather than a still image.

parameters.name: playbackStyle
parameters.summary: An option for how much of the Live Photo's motion and sound content to play.

methods.name: stopPlayback
methods.summary: Ends playback of Live Photo content in the view.

properties.name: livePhoto
properties.summary: The Live Photo displayed in the view.
properties.description: You receive a new live photo object by selecting an existing photo from the photo gallery. Note: iOS 9.1 only allows to select existing photos from the gallery, capturing new live photos is not supported by the iOS public API, yet.

properties.name: muted
properties.summary: A Boolean value that determines whether the view plays the audio content of its Live Photo.
properties.description: The default value is false, indicating that the view plays audio content along with the motion content of its Live Photo. Change this value to true to play motion content but not audio content.
